list.name: Name
list.desc: The name of this entry.

list.name: Model Name
list.desc: The model used by this part; requires an entry in ModelParam.

list.name: Instance ID
list.desc: Involved with serialization.

list.name: Layout Path
list.desc: A path to a .sib file, presumably some kind of editor placeholder.

list.name: Position
list.desc: The position of this part.

list.name: Rotation
list.desc: The rotation of this part.

list.name: Scale
list.desc: The scale of this part. Scale will NOT affect the scale of enemies or the scale of in-built collision for objects and assets (except for assets in Elden Ring).

list.name: Game Edition Disable Type
list.desc: Toggles the loading of this part.

list.name: Map Studio Layer
list.desc: Unknown.

list.name: Entity ID
list.desc: Identifies the part in event scripts.

list.name: Uses Parts Draw Param ID
list.desc: Enables use of PartsDrawParamID. If false, asset param is used instead.

list.name: Parts Draw Param ID
list.desc: The Parts Draw Param ID to use.

list.name: Is Point Light Shadow Source
list.desc: Is this part to be considered a Point Light shadow source.

list.name: UnkE0B
list.desc: Unknown

list.name: Is Shadow Source
list.desc: Is this part to be considered a shadow source.

list.name: Is Static Shadow Source
list.desc: Is this part to be considered a static shadow source.

list.name: Is Cascade Shadow Source
list.desc: Is this part to be considered a cascade shadow source.

list.name: Is Shadow Destination
list.desc: Is this part to be considered a shadow destination.

list.name: Is Shadow Only
list.desc: Is this part only rendered when calculating the shadow pass.

list.name: Is Drawn by Reflection Camera
list.desc: Is this part drawn by the reflection camera.

list.name: Is Drawn Only by the Reflection Camera
list.desc: Is this part only drawn within the reflection camera.

list.name: Entity Group ID
list.desc: A entity group ID associated with this part. Allows multiple parts to be identified with a single entity ID.

list.name: Display Group
list.desc: A display group for this part.

list.name: Draw Group
list.desc: A draw group for this part.

list.name: Collision Mask
list.desc: A collision mask for this part.

list.name: Display Group
list.desc: A display group for this part.

list.name: Light Set ID
list.desc: ID of the value set from LightSet ParamEditor to use.

list.name: Fog Param ID
list.desc: ID of the value set from FogParamEditor to use.

list.name: Light Scattering ID
list.desc: ID of the value set from LightScattering : ParamEditor to use.

list.name: Environment Map ID
list.desc: ID of the value set from Env Map:Editor to use.

list.name: Transition Time
list.desc: Transition time between scenes.

list.name: Graphics Param Override: [1]
list.desc: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override use.

list.name: Graphics Param Override: [2]
list.desc: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override [1] with.

list.name: Graphics Param Override: [3]
list.desc: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override [1] and [2] with.

list.name: Graphics Param Override: [4]
list.desc: Value of the hundredths place of a Gparam to override [1], [2] and [3] with.

list.name: Map ID
list.desc: The four ID parts of the map that this map object belongs to. Used in overworld map tiles to link the map object to a specific overworld tile. Order is reverse of map ID string.

list.name: Think Param ID
list.desc: An ID in NPCThinkParam that determines the enemy's AI characteristics.

list.name: NPC Param ID
list.desc: An ID in NPCParam that determines a variety of enemy properties.

list.name: Talk ID
list.desc: An ID pointing to an .ESD file that contains the a Talk setup.

list.name: Platoon ID
list.desc: An ID pointing to a platoon type, used by patrolling groups of enemies.

list.name: Character Init ID
list.desc: An ID in CharaInitParam that determines a human's inventory and stats.

list.name: Collision Part Name
list.desc: The Name of the collision that this Enemy starts on.

list.name: Walk Route Name
list.desc: Walk route followed by this enemy.

list.name: Activation Condition ID
list.desc: ID in ChrActivateConditionParam that affects enemy appearance conditions.

list.name: Backup Event Anim ID
list.desc: Default event animation to apply to the enemy whilst it is idle.

list.name: SpEffect Set ID
list.desc: Refers to SpEffectSetParam ID. Applies SpEffects to an enemy.

list.name: Hit Filter ID
list.desc: Sets collision behavior. Fall collision, death collision, enemy-only collision, etc.

list.name: Play Region ID
list.desc: Used to determine invasion eligibility.

list.name: Disable Torrent
list.desc: Disable being able to summon/ride Torrent.

list.name: Fast Travel Enabled Flag
list.desc: Disables Fast Travel if Event Flag is not set.

list.name: Collision Name
list.desc: The collision part to attach to.

list.name: Map ID
list.desc: The map to load when on this collision.

list.name: Asset SFX Param Relative ID
list.desc: Value added onto model ID determining AssetModelSfxParam to use.

list.name: Disable Torrent
list.desc: Disable being able to summon/ride Torrent, but only when asset isn't referencing collision DisableTorrent.

list.name: Disable upon Map Load - Map ID
list.desc: Disables the asset when the specified map is loaded.
